root.name: Jagged Alliance
root.description: This turn-based RPG combines a unique mix of high technology, tactical manoeuvring and strategic planning with a compelling storyline that tests the limits of players’ strategy and role-playing skills. The highly revered classic was originally released for PC in 1994 as part of a series of award-winning strategy games. In its DS debut, Jagged Alliance boasts a unique blend of turn-based combat, strategy and role-playing, creating a compelling and addictive playing experience unlike almost anything else. The non-linear gameplay uniquely unfolds based entirely on the player’s moves and decisions.
